properties.query:
DeviceFileEvents
| where FolderPath endswith ".evtx" and (not(((FolderPath endswith "\\Windows\\System32\\winevt\\Logs\\" and FolderPath startswith "C:\\ProgramData\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Containers\\BaseImages\\") or FolderPath startswith "C:\\Windows\\System32\\winevt\\Logs\\")))

tags.name: description
tags.value:
Detects the creation of new files with the ".evtx" extension in non-common or non-standard location.
This could indicate tampering with default EVTX locations in order to evade security controls or simply exfiltration of event log to search for sensitive
